    • Method Detail

      • mecanumDrive

        public void mecanumDrive(float rightX,
                         float rightY,
                         float leftX,
                         float leftY,
                         boolean slowDrive)
        Clips joystick values and drives the motors.
        Parameters:
        rightX - Right X joystick value
        rightY - Right Y joystick value
        leftX - Left X joystick value
        leftY - Left Y joystick value in case you couldn't tell from the others
        slowDrive - Set to true for 30 % motor power.

      • driveGodMode

        public void driveGodMode(float rightX,
                         float rightY,
                         float leftX,
                         float leftY)
        Drives in God Mode (keeping angles consistent with the heading so it doesn't turn unexpectedly)
        Parameters:
        rightX - Right X value of the joystick
        rightY - Right Y value of the joystick
        leftX - Left X value of the joystick
        leftY - Left Y value of the joystick in case that wasn't clear

      • driveGodMode

        public void driveGodMode(float rightX,
                         float rightY,
                         float leftX,
                         float leftY,
                         float coeff)
        Drives in God Mode (keeping angles consistent with the heading so it doesn't turn unexpectedly)
        Parameters:
        rightX - Right X value of the joystick
        rightY - Right Y value of the joystick
        leftX - Left X value of the joystick
        leftY - Left Y value of the joys
        coeff - Used to set speed
